properties.description: We are an Anglican Parish Church in Thornton. We aim to be the centre of the community as Churches always used to be. We have things going on for young and old alike and everyone in between. Check out the calendar on our website to see what we have going on and the majority of our facilities are donation based. We have a food pantry open every weekday in the mornings and have three Worship Services on Sundays at 9am, 11am and 5pm
